trans-unit.source: The modules in this group are used to convert datasets used in Azure Machine Learning Studio to some of the standard file formats used by other machine learning tools, or for exporting datasets to tab-delimited or comma-delimited files format.
trans-unit.target: The modules in this group are used to convert datasets used in Azure Machine Learning Studio to some of the standard file formats used by other machine learning tools, or for exporting datasets to tab-delimited or comma-delimited files format.

trans-unit.source: These modules convert a given dataset to the specified format as is, and do not perform any manipulation of the values.
trans-unit.target: These modules convert a given dataset to the specified format as is, and do not perform any manipulation of the values.

trans-unit.source: If you need to filter, fix missing values, change column names, or remove missing values, use the modules here: <link xlink:href="9c2844b8-7a4c-483b-848a-e35a27855716" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data transformation</link>.
trans-unit.target: If you need to filter, fix missing values, change column names, or remove missing values, use the modules here: <link xlink:href="9c2844b8-7a4c-483b-848a-e35a27855716" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Data transformation</link>.

trans-unit.source: If you need to import external data into Azure Machine Learning, you can upload datasets in CSV format, or you can use the <link xlink:href="4e1b0fe6-aded-4b3f-a36f-39b8862b9004" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Reader</link> module.
trans-unit.target: If you need to import external data into Azure Machine Learning, you can upload datasets in CSV format, or you can use the <link xlink:href="4e1b0fe6-aded-4b3f-a36f-39b8862b9004" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Reader</link> module.

trans-unit.source: If you need to save machine learning datasets out to Azure blob storage, a Hadoop cluster, or other cloud-based storage, use the <link xlink:href="7a391181-b6a7-4ad4-b82d-e419c0d6522c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writer</link> module.
trans-unit.target: If you need to save machine learning datasets out to Azure blob storage, a Hadoop cluster, or other cloud-based storage, use the <link xlink:href="7a391181-b6a7-4ad4-b82d-e419c0d6522c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Writer</link> module.

trans-unit.source: The Data Format Conversions category includes these modules:
trans-unit.target: The Data Format Conversions category includes these modules:

trans-unit.source: Converts data input to the attribute relation file format used by the Weka toolset
trans-unit.target: Converts data input to the attribute relation file format used by the Weka toolset

trans-unit.source: Converts a dataset to a comma-separated values format
trans-unit.target: Converts a dataset to a comma-separated values format

trans-unit.source: Converts a data input to the internal Dataset format used by Microsoft Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Converts a data input to the internal Dataset format used by Microsoft Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Converts data input to the format used by the SVM-Light framework
trans-unit.target: Converts data input to the format used by the SVM-Light framework

trans-unit.source: Converts data input to the tab-delimited format
trans-unit.target: Converts data input to the tab-delimited format
